title: [1.12.2-1.7.10][Simple Harvest—简单收获]让我们简单收获恶魔的果实吧
txt_content:
本帖最后由 猜猜谁是谁 于 2018-5-24 20:09 编辑 

----------------------------------------------------------------------

右键作物会直接掉落物品，比如小麦土豆萝卜，不在需要重新种植
----------------------------------------------------------------------
想让其支持其他模组的作物可通过给JSON配置文件添加想要收获的作物

----------------------------------------------------------------------
各版本下载地址
1.12.2-1.2.6-18http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-769039-1-1.html
1.11.2-1.2.1-13https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/simpleharvest/files/2432105/download
1.10.2-1.1.0-10https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/simpleharvest/files/2323970/download
1.9.4-1.1.0-10https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/simpleharvest/files/2323970/download
1.8.9-1.0.0-2https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/simpleharvest/files/2277507/download
1.7.10-1.0.0-2https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/simpleharvest/files/2279650/downloa

----------------------------------------------------------------------

replies.author: itterly
replies.txt_content: pam's自带这个功能

replies.author: J_黑默丁格
replies.txt_content: 恶魔果实是海贼王mod的那个？

replies.author: zero000038
replies.txt_content:
對於那些沒打算為了一個右鍵收穫而安裝一個算是較大型mod的人而言，
這個感覺就蠻好的

replies.author: 呆又呆
replies.txt_content: 好棒，一直在找这个，终于找到1.12能用的了，谢谢分享

replies.author: HoutkixcM
replies.txt_content: 谢谢分享，一直在找这个

replies.author: 二哈大魔王
replies.txt_content: 1.12.2的下载地址在那啊。。

replies.author: 没糖的葫芦
replies.txt_content: 请注意修改模板中的支持版本，目前1.12.2可选，并申请移出本版。

replies.author: mc打枪强
replies.txt_content: 就是像mite（mc is too eazy）里的蓝莓一样右键完植株还在四吧

replies.author: wah7758521
replies.txt_content: 终于找到这个mod了

replies.author: 有毒吧星人
replies.txt_content: 这个很好用啊 方便

replies.author: 柿子shizi
replies.txt_content: 那么是不是工具时运就没有效果了
怎么添加需要右键收获的作物啊？

replies.author: w2639443897
replies.txt_content: 这个是海贼模组?

replies.author: sun汪汪
replies.txt_content: 好用好用好用

replies.author: MooNight_mi
replies.txt_content: 很赞的MOD，感谢楼主分享

replies.author: k0saber
replies.txt_content: 感谢大佬分享~

replies.author: joeyzhang2001
replies.txt_content: 很实用。。。

replies.author: 永恒之爱意
replies.txt_content: 谁能帮我把魔法作物MOD的作物加进去，我不会啊！

replies.author: 尼玛飞啊飞
replies.txt_content: 有没有人补帖啊
